Class ProjectSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.projects.ProjectSelector

extends java.lang.Object
    The selection and creation of an object of type ProjectActions

    • Method Detail

      • createProject

        public ProjectActions createProject(java.lang.String ext)
        Returns a ProjectActions selected based on the extension of files which define the project caterory
        Parameters:
        ext - the file extension
        Returns:
        a new ProjectActions. Null if the extension does not identify a project category
